backend/main.mo: Main backend canister initializing access control, blob storage, and defining all user, exercise, measurement, calorie, motivation, and progress-related data types.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing favicon‑related features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file, mainly React components, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point referencing generated favicon PNGs and loading the main React application.
frontend/ops/publish-draft-50-to-live.md: Runbook detailing steps to promote Draft Version 50 to production and verifying deployment success.
frontend/public/favicon.ico: Binary favicon placeholder referenced in feature evidence.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level React component handling authentication logic, profile setup flow, and routing to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/BurnedCalorieTra: Component for adding, editing, and displaying burned‑calorie entries with validation and toast‑based error handling.
frontend/src/components/CalorieTracker.t: Tracks calorie entries with add and edit dialogs and displays stats and a chart.
Manages weekly exercise plans, allowing users to add exercises by day and category and delete the current week's plan.
Shows daily exercise checklist, supports marking exercises complete, deleting them, and calculates a streak.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with user greeting, profile edit button, and logout.
frontend/src/components/MeasurementsTrac: Records and updates body measurements and shows latest and initial measurement comparisons.
frontend/src/components/MotivationCard.t: Fetches and displays the daily motivational saying with a loading state.
frontend/src/components/ProfileEditDialo: Provides a dialog for editing user profile details and motivational preferences.
frontend/src/components/ProgressPhotoGal: Displays a placeholder card for an upcoming progress photo upload feature with alerts and icons.
frontend/src/components/ProgressView.tsx: Aggregates weight, measurement, calorie, and workout progress data and renders various charts and stats.
frontend/src/components/WeightTracker.ts: Manages weight entry creation and editing, and displays weight history with charts and progress stats.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login, and logout handling using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profile, measurements, weight, calories, progress, and other backend data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes, including color and layout tokens.
frontend/src/lib/generate-favicons.ts: Generates heart-themed favicon PNGs using canvas and provides a helper to download them along with a list of standard favicon sizes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main authenticated dashboard with tabs for tracking weight, calories, exercise, photos, and progress.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays a styled login screen using Internet Identity with branding and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetup.tsx: Provides a form for creating a user profile with name, email, motivational style, and preferences.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines TailwindCSS configuration with extended colors, animations, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, favicon regeneration requirements, known issues, and feature definitions.
